New Records: Dalton Knecht recorded a career-high 27 points
Key Match Events: Dalton Knecht added 10 points in the third quarter alone as the Lakers turned the game around
The Lakers won 104-99 behind his impeccable performance
Pre-Game Insights: Dalton Knecht has been efficient in the past two games, dropping 19 points in a season-best outing against the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday
He managed 14 points on 6 of 11 shots, including 2 of 4 from 3, in his second start on Friday against the San Antonio Spurs
Post-Match Reflections: His prospects of getting significant minutes in the lineup continue to grow at this rate when the Lakers get healthy and have most of their frontcourt players available
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dalton Knecht's third quarter changes Lakers fortunes vs. Pelicans
He played excellent defense in the second half, an area where he's seemingly struggled for most of his rookie season
Others: Rui Hachimura missed another game, allowing Dalton Knecht to secure his third career start
